title: Recovery-Oriented Education Program for Mental Health Care Providers: Simulation/VR Training Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental theories and care experiences in mental health
context.additional_context: VR-based real-world scenario simulations and LMS-supported online learning for graduate students in speech therapy/counseling

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five core principles of a recovery-oriented approach (self-determination, hope, learning/growth, identity, connectedness) with 80% accuracy in simulated scenarios
Learners can practice crisis response strategies at least three times through VR-based role-playing while incorporating feedback
Learners can share recovery case studies with peer learners in LMS discussion forums and provide critical feedback at least twice
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
